org.mini2Dx.ui.render

Class RenderLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.render.RenderLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RenderLayer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiContainerRenderLayer

    public class RenderLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RenderLayer>
    Represents a layer of RenderNodes on the z axis of a ParentRenderNode
